content.detailedDescription:
November 7th, 2015
approximately 6:15-20pm
rancho cucamonga-upland ca
i was driving home from dropping my boyfriend off at work. on my way home, driving west bound on foothill blvd. i saw three bright star-like objects forming a triangle and moving eastbound. i turned into a side street to get a closer look. at a closer look they appeared to be airplanes but they traveled at exactly the same distance apart form each other and retained distance. this seemed odd but i continued to drive home which at this point was only about 7 minutes away. while pulling into the drive way into my apartments which faces north, my younger brother (9 years old), in the backseat, noticed something in the sky, and given the past weird situation was incredibly enthused. i looked up, expecting to not see much since the three lights we saw earlier probably had his senses a little too heightened. when i did look up a noticed an very big, very bright light in the sky above the roofs of our apartment buildings. i was a bit awestruck. after pulling over to the side i got out of my car and attempted to record it. it was bright and i could not exactly tell what the light was coming from, but the light itself appeared to be cone shaped, except the part of the cone that would be a circle was instead an elongated oval. the oval part of the light was positioned vertically. initially i took it for an airplane with a searchlight, but the light was not facing downwards it was facing out, almost at a southeast direction. my brother also noticed what seemed to be a "star" like figure but which was moving southbound. i thought it was a plane but it had no red flicker light like planes usually do and  it seemed to be higher than a plane would be. it also moved incredibly slowly. i lost sight of this incredibly fast, being too fascinated with the greater light(which in direction to the "star" like figure was to it's right)i was able to acquire a video of it with my phone, but by that time it was beginning to fade out. while videoing, i also noticed there was what seemed to be a green fog (but with the light from the unknown object hitting it, it seemed more like green light)next to it. the more the light faded out, the less the green showed. the bright light was visible for about 30-40 seconds total during which it seemed to fade out into a fog, expand a bit, and then disappear completely. once it disappeared, i ran back to my car, parked it and ran back to the sight. the light was completely gone but as i looked up i noticed the green fog still lingering. it looked to be an almost transparent green cloud of mist. i never saw the mist leave, for i ran up to my apartments in hope to search and find any other similar findings that may have been reported that same day.
content.summary: I was driving home with my brother when he pointed out a large, large light source coming from the sky

Lights. in cal. not missal land after hovered10 min. came down land 1/2 mile in hills 4x4. auss.Able . drove to ear by not see but glowing  went hill across valley see lights on hill 15 min. after landed  could not see after lights went out can take u to

content.detailedDescription: On the way to the mall and four light going together then apart kept staying a little bit ahead of the vehicle. at first thought it was just some lights from the ground but when i kept driving and it kept going forward i began to wonder what it was
content.summary: Four light going in together then back out apart

content.detailedDescription: Today i marc frazier was walking my dog at 6:00 pm. as i was walking my dog near rochelle street and duneville street between decatur st. and jones these are the main streets. in the sky i notice a bright light this type of light was like a search light coming from a police helicopter. but the light was moving kind of slow over some apartment moving north bound from the street tropicana direction it pass over the street rochelle in my sight. it moved slow then a heavy smoke like screen started shooting out from the light the color of the smoke was white like clouds color. but how i notice it because the light was engulf in the smoke screen. this was a strong light projection because the light seemed like a beam. then the light shifted direction toward jones st. west bound heading towards the mountains but upward like 45 degrees angle, not sure of the speed. the smoke continue to shoot out of it and i notice the a blueish/lavender  color trail was right back of this light object. i went home and call 911 at 6:14 pm and reported this incident. do you think it was wise for me to report this incident to the local authority. p.S. i wish i had my cell phone with me so i could have video and taken pictures.
content.summary: Strange light moving and shooting out white smoke

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday november 7 at exactly 6:00pm pacific time while sweeping the driveway with a broom at my home at trinity drive, menlo park, ca my wife came out of the house with my 3 year old son, and said, "okay, we're ready to go to dinner" and then she immediately said, "honey! what is that thing in the sky!?". i looked up and was instantly amazed at what i was looking at. the 3 of us watched it in awe for several seconds before i pulled out my iphone 6s from my pocket and captured the following video: https://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ll23lvbm-vo 

at the first moment i looked up and saw the object, a very bright white/blue beam of light emanated from the rear of the object and it shined through the center of a cone shaped cloud of light (maybe 60-70 degrees in angle from the source craft towards the rear). the cone shaped cloud of light was much brighter to the naked eye than it appears in my iphone video. it was white with a slight blue tint to it and a clear demarcation point at the edges of the cone. the main beam was more blue in color than the cloud around it and the light beam close to the craft, at the source, was bright white. very bright white - much brighter than commercial airliner landing lights. there is always lots of air traffic over my house for both sfo, sjc international airports and a host of smaller/light aircraft from the nearby local municipal airports. as i have seen ufos before, i am always careful to observe the sky and can easily discern conventional aircraft from non-conventional aircraft. this was a non-conventional aircraft. i did notice smaller aircraft in the vicinity both before, during, and after the incident. surely, a couple pilots noticed this phenomena.

from the first instant i observed the object to the moment the bright light extinguished, the intensity of the light was slowly dimming. it was the most brilliant when i first noticed it and then became slowly "dimmer" as the object traveled in a north western direction until the light finally softly died out. once the bright light source died out, the trailing white-blue beam and the large "plasma-like" cone-shaped cloud remained glowing and very visible for a few minutes. the craft itself was also still visible as a dimly glowing object. again, no blinking lights or conventional aircraft lights. the shape of the craft was difficult to discern but my best guess was a triangular shape. no visible wings/tail structure could be observed and there was absolutely no sound. the craft seemed transparent or translucent with only a faint glow around it. i assume it was cloaked. my wife and i tracked the craft across the sky for several minutes until we could no longer see it. the craft's course did not seem to change.

this was the 3rd ufo sighting i have witnessed in the past 10 months and the first time i have reported a sighting. this sighting was the most profound i have witnessed of the 3 i have seen and it has strongly impacted me psychologically.
content.summary: Bright plasma cloud emanating from rear of non-conventional aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5 pm pst, the power went out in our entire neighborhood while i was outside in the spa. i came inside for a while then decided to sit outside because it was a beautiful clear evening.  i had my binoculars with me to look at birds. i observed a bright light hovering in the south, way brighter than a helicopter, larger and with a flamelike glow. at first i thought it was an aerial show for some event.  i observed other aircraft in the proximity in near miss flight paths but due to my viewpoint could not gauge the depth of field and since they were much smaller i assumed they were more distant than this object.  it was doing a slow but clumsy looping flight. i must say i thought this had unusual flight characteristics so i looked at it through the binoculars several times but could not detect any shape just flamelike light. it moved off in the distance and left my field of view, so i sat down to look at stars.

for quite a while i was looking at stars to the east, especially the pleiades. i was enjoying the beautiful dark sky view due to the exceptionally clear conditions and the power outage. i also observed every helicopter and fixed wing aircraft through my binoculars which i would describe as normal abundant san diego air traffic.  i often observe the abundant military aircraft in our area and say a thank you in my heart to our brave military, police, and firefighters.  i like to see our beautiful san diego "fire one" red helicopter and the miramar osprey and fighter jet flights. that is to say i frequently observe aircraft through my binoculars and i know what they look like. 

now i began to feel cold and turn back to go inside about 6 p.M.  that is when things start going off the charts. i see a large slow moving object trailing a flamelike projection. i know it is the same object i saw before but much closer. in fact it is so close and big and silent, i think it is a drone. so i look at it through binocs. hey this isn't a drone, not a copter, plus it is trailing flame plus a bright blue light cone. now i think it is a rocket and i get scared...I start snapping pictures with my phone.  as an engineer, part of my brain is telling me rockets can't fly this slow and with no sound, but still i am trying to observe and note every nuance. i am toggling between binocs and phone, snapping a series of still photos.

now the object begins directing a bright beam of light, brighter than any search light, back and forth and the beam comes right at me and causes me to put down binocs, yell, think about hiding, but i feel it is my duty to just watch and snap pics.  at this point i am yelling to neighbors down the hill or anybody "can you see that?!" "what is it?!"  i want to call 911 but hesitate. i text my husband to call me because i am looking at a ufo. as the light intensifies i text him "call mufon call mufon not kidding!" then it explodes! only with no sound only light and a concentric light ring like a blast wave surrounding the most hypnotic iridescent aqua blue diffuse light cloud, easily three times the size of the moon.  now i call 911 and it is pegged busy.  i can hear neighbors in their yards.  i hang up, are you kidding me, they are busy?! i text my husband that 911 is pegged so this is real!

now sheriffs 911 responder calls me back so i describe what i am seeing. i tell her all the above plus that the power is out. she tells me everyone all over the county is calling but i am the first to report power outage.  she is asking me if it looks like a rocket and if i see any debris falling to ground. i'm describing details plus my viewing conditions (elevated hill with 360 views). i say i'm an engineer and if you can get a rocket to stay aloft at that slow speed, i want to know what your technology is. i am describing this huge luminous aqua cloud residue that is not dissipating just hanging in a perfect diffuse circle.  i ask her if she thinks it could be chemical.  i know i am not speaking to a person with the same technical background i have. i begin to feel bad about tying up the bandwidth so i reassure her, no debris, no injuries, no fire on ground. so i hang up and watch the cloud until it stops glowing, continue to take still photos.  i finally think of video, but by now the event is over. i keep watching the area for air response or reconnaissance. nothing. no responses. usually they send heavy air response with searchlights for fugitives and aggressive air response for any suspected fire because of our high fire danger. nothing.  now the power comes back on and jolts me out of my skin, approximately 6:20 p.M.

later i see on the news that this is already explained as a confirmed drill by the navy on behalf of the faa. not buying it. why:
1. you do not explode a device over civilian airspace for a drill.
2. 911 operators did not inform callers of drill in order to clear emergency lines.
3. object had flight and light capabilities well exceeding normal parameters, namely stable silent low speed flight, and light candlepower way above sodium or any searchlight plus light control of the shape of the beam.
4. you cannot have a soundless explosion with glowing diffuse residue that hangs in the air in a perfect circle with no odors, no drifting and having the brilliant color and luminous properties covering a diameter easily 3 times the size of the moon and stable for 10 minutes.
5. the flight path prior to explosion can only be described as rogue, almost playful, but not purposeful like a drill.
6. if this was an faa drill, where is the faa response? we have enough assets in this area to mount a massive response and they are good at what they do. no sirens no nothing.

if any of the noted capabilities are in our grasp, i pledge to complete an advanced physics degree and work for the nsa or nasa for free for the rest of my life on behalf of humanity.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Saw bright object hovering and circling with flamelike glow. flew slowly horizontally with trail. directed light then exploded with luminous aqua cloud residue.

content.detailedDescription:
I live at the end of a canyon that is actually within the angeles national forest. i was sitting outside in my patio looking at the sky. the sky was clear and cloudless. it was after dark. first i noticed the beam, then a very large, round mass of blue-white light/mist appeared in the sky directly above me and hovered momentarily. there was a strong, bright beam of light coming from the front, pointing into the direction it was moving.  the beam  widened as a flashlight does and swept from side to side, slowly. the mist obscured whatever it was from view, and i could see the mist rolling away from it,  as it passed over the house. it was completely silent. it continued into the west, leaving behind an electric blue cloud of mist. we could see it far into the distance, though not clearly. the beam of light appeared to be directed downward as it continued west until it disappeared from sight. i thought it was a ufo because i am 58 years old and have only once seen anything else that resembled it, and that thing i believe to have been a ufo. i was curious. i called to my husband to come see it, too. we went to the front of the house so we could continue to watch it, which we did until it disappeared into the distance.  i called my neighbor who also saw it and also believed it to be a ufo. i called my son who lives in warner springs, 2 1/2 hours from me. he had just seen it, saying he was  seeing swirling colors in the sky resembling the aurora borealis.
i have since heard that there were sightings thursday night and no military or faa operations.
now the news is saying it's the navy conducting military operations out to sea. for some reason, i don't believe these explanations. it didn't look at all like a rocket and as far as i know, rockets don't have sweeping beams of light.
i've seen the pictures and videos people have posted online, but they were all taken from a distance and don't look like what i saw from directly below the object.
content.summary: Appeared directly overhead, hovered momentarily, emitted a strong bright beam, was surrounded by a lot of blue vapor.

content.detailedDescription: While feeding my horses, i noticed a bright light with what looked like a searchlight below it. it didn't look like something i see normally. then it stopped. it looked like it expoded. it put out a surrounding light (like daylight). it was huge! it flashed one large lite field, then another, even larger. then little sparkles around it. this happened within about maybe 2 min. then it started moving west.  it made no sound. we,(my husband and i) watched as long as we could see it. it was  headed toward san bernardino. it seemed to be unaffected by what it had just produced.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glob of light traveling north e stopped looked like it exploded ! giant light around it!

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking to our car after an homecoming event at her college when we noticed a bright light like a helicopter search light. after staring at it we noticed it seemed to far away and hovering in such a way that it was not helicopter like and there where no flashing lights that you would see on any aviation vehicle. after staring for a period of time the light
started to fade behind a misty cloud and eventually disappear, leaving behind a greenish chem trail mist that eventually disappeared.
content.summary: Observed bright light like a flash light in the sky being enveloped with a misty cloud then disappearing leaving a green misty trail in its place

content.detailedDescription: I was parking my van in the driveway. i dropped my daughter's friend off at home when my daughter and i saw a light trailing behind it was a blue beam and it released a puff of smoke or vapor the shape of the bottom of an hour glass with the blue streak going through the middle of it. we watched it until it appeared to go into outer space then it looked like a star for a minute then it was gone. i don't know what it was but i was wondering if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: I saw a blue beam coming from a elongated cone that let out some kind of vapor.

content.detailedDescription: My 12 year old son and i just finished having ice cream at a shopping center in montecito. as we approached our vehicle, we noticed an orange glowing oval shaped object with a flat bottom coming from the east. we thought it might be helicopter, as it was flying at that typical rate of speed, although it had no blinking lights, and it was silent. when the object arrived directly over us, it emitted a bright white light behind it that looked like a spot light, which was approximately 25 times the size of the object itself. the light then became hollow and strongly defined on the outer edges, like a bubble. the back end then opened and it turned into a massive conical shape. from the  center of the cone a blue green haze appeared. the white light was foggy or misty in appearance with strayations through out. the oval shaped object turned white, and broke away continuing on it's path to the west. it never made a sound, nor did it accelerate or decelerate. i felt a little uneasy after the event, as i have had encounters and lost time in the past which i have never reported. we continued to watch the object until it was too small to see. my son captured partial video on his phone, but we were not able to get quality imagery to show what we experienced. i know that the military is presently diverting air traffic at lax for undisclosed reasons, so perhaps it was experimental craft or a rocket of some kind.
content.summary: Bright orange silent oval shaped object flying over head emitted a bubble like light which tuned conical. oval shaped object turned white, broke away from smokey white light and continued to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my pet he was pupping the sky was super clear, it was cold!
i new it was ufo it was going fast 6 of them, oval shape just like a tictac moving in a straight line from palatine to lake michigan lost them in horizon
content.summary: Saw 6 lights in a row going from west to east

content.detailedDescription: Does anyone have any explanation for what i just saw in the sky? the video is dark, but this object was flying smoothly and was very bright, leaving a white, cloudy trail. i have never been a witness to anything like this, so i'm wondering if anyone knows what it was or if they also saw it over the #santamonica sky. please don't say it was an airplane because i see them from the balcony all the time and know the difference... there was also an opening in the sky that was a lighter blue than the night sky as if it left it from entering the atmosphere. when i saw this i ran for my phone. look at the end of the video, something clearly detaches or separates itself from the cloud it left. #ufo #santamonicaufo or #comet #laufo #losangelesufo #theskypaidme after the light was gone the object kept flying in in darkness.
content.summary: Bright object flying over santa monica

content.detailedDescription: Does anyone have any explanation for what i just saw in the sky? the video is dark, but this object was flying smoothly and was very bright, leaving a white, cloudy trail. i have never been a witness to anything like this, so i'm wondering if anyone knows what it was or if they also saw it over the #santamonica sky. please don't say it was an airplane because i see them from the balcony all the time and know the difference... there was also an opening in the sky that was a lighter blue than the night sky as if it left it from entering the atmosphere. when i saw this i ran for my phone. look at the end of the video, something clearly detaches or separates itself from the cloud it left. #ufo #santamonicaufo or #comet #laufo #losangelesufo #theskypaidme after the light was gone the object kept flying in in darkness.
content.summary: Bright object flying over santa monica

content.detailedDescription:
We had walked up to marie callendars to eat and as soon as we reached the sign at the driveway, i noticed orange-like flame emerge from black sky to the south. as we debated over whether it was a firework or flare, flames flared out, with what looked liked sparks. then it shrunk to a round orange shape just before it turned white. could not see what was producing the light but the white cone shaped 'flame' began to expand, filling the now western sky. it started out directly south of my location, began ascending and turned due northwest. as the cone 'flame'began to dissipate, a thick glowing green line remained in the sky with some white residue, for lack of a better word. we were able to see a small white point of light continue ascent in a northwestern direction.

i was with my daughter,and grandson.
content.summary: Saw flames, then white light

content.detailedDescription: At 6pm a gigantic super bright search light with cloud like features appeared that lit up the sky and the whole canyon south of emigrant gap on hwy 80!...It was right over head,many cars pulled of the road to watch thing!...After 5 min the northern part split off and headed west toward sacramento...It had a comet like appearance,but still as bright! the original cloud stayed stationary as its light diminished to nothing!...The comet thing just disappeared after several minutes!...The whole event lasted 14 to 16 minutes!...I watched the event from the west bound observation area and scenic overlook with other motorist who were just as spellbound as me!...I commented that nobody would believe us!...One man said "i believe you man,cuz i'm here and saw it too!"....He told me about mufon and that i should post it!
content.summary: a gigantic super bright search light with cloud like features

content.detailedDescription: At 6pm a gigantic super bright search light with cloud like features appeared that lit up the sky and the whole canyon south of emigrant gap on hwy 80!...It was right over head,many cars pulled of the road to watch thing!...After 5 min the northern part split off and headed west toward sacramento...It had a comet like appearance,but still as bright! the original cloud stayed stationary as its light diminished to nothing!...The comet thing just disappeared after several minutes!...The whole event lasted 14 to 16 minutes!...I watched the event from the west bound observation area and scenic overlook with other motorist who were just as spellbound as me!...I commented that nobody would believe us!...One man said "i believe you man,cuz i'm here and saw it too!"....He told me about mufon and that i should post it!
content.summary: a gigantic super bright search light with cloud like features

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a white light streaming accross the sky, turned yellow, expaded to a bright blue orb and remained still emulating a perfect expanding ring of fog. the blue light faded away after 20 minutes. i hoped on google and found many vidios of the exact event around the word! kusi also reported event with footage. kusi claims milatary was testing....Some of the footage that i found has already been removed off the net!!

viewed in my back yard with neighbors. was very concern with the fog released because it grew to a massive size.
content.summary: All over kusi news....Claiming missle test but this exact form is recorded all over the world

content.detailedDescription:
My mom, son and i were walking to dinner on whittier blvd. in la habra, california. my mom pointed south and said look. i saw what i thought was a firework shoot up from behind the treeline. i said that. she said no. i said flare. she said no. at this point, it was a bright orange star like object shooting up and to the west. it had a trail. i pulled out my phone and took pictures. as it got higher, it turned white. then it began to expand into a bright white light and continued to expand. i saw the green mist it left behind and i was able to see a small white orb as it moved into the west. i have video and photos. unlike the ones i have seen so far, i have it while the object was still orange. it looked as though it came out of fullerton, california because it literally shot up from behind the treeline. 

it will not upload my video or pictures. it keeps kicking me off the site.
content.summary: I saw it from shooting up from the treetop.

content.detailedDescription:
My 12 year old son and i had just finished having ice cream in a shopping center in montecito, as we approached our vehicle, we noticed an orange orb in the sky, which we thought was a helicopter at first sight. it was difficult to determine the elevation. it was traveling in a straight path from east to west, anywhere from five to ten thousand feet.
the object made no sound. the rate of speed was typical to that of a helicopter. it had no blinking lights. it was oval in shape with a flat bottom. the duration of the event was roughly three minutes. as the object came in line with us, it emitted a bright light behind it which looked like a massive spotlight (approximately 20 to 25 times the size of the orb). the light became hollow, giving the appearance that the orb was blowing a bubble of light. the back end of the bubble opened and turned into a huge conical shape with a blue green hue in the center. as the light on the outer edges of the light dispersed it was strayated in appearance. the light that it produced was accompanied by something that looked like mist or fog. the orb in its process changed from orange to white, and broke away from the conical light, and continued on its path to the west. it never changed its rate of speed. our reaction to the object was calm and objective. shortly after the incident, i felt uneasy, as i have experience encounters and abductions in the past, which i have never reported. we watched the object continue to the west until it was to small to see.
content.summary: My 12 yr. old son and i, witnessed and  orange glowing orb emit a white luminous, extremely bright light, as if it were blowing a bubble around itself. orb than turned white. mist transformed into a conical shape with blue green in the center.

content.detailedDescription: The three of us were walking our dog in our neighborhood. when we got a block away in the same residential area my wife pointed out an object that was flying right overhead. we all looked up and saw a reflective/shimmering object flying south and low over the houses. the object was not making any noise which was strange because it was flying as fast as a jet but so low to the neighborhood there should have been a loud noise. when we got home we drew what we saw and compared. we all saw a triangular type object flying low over the houses in our neighborhood in south direction and the object shimmered, like it was trying to camouflage itself, and there were spots underneith like there were supposed to be multiple lights (50 or so), but they were not on. the city lights reflected off the bottom. the other strange thing is just before and after it happened all the dogs in the neighborhood were barking non-stop.
content.summary: Reflective/camouflage object flying low and south over houses made no noise and flying fast

content.detailedDescription: I was doing a ce-5 protocol meditation and about 20 min there appeared a glowing orb ne from my home , i grabbed my laser pointer and pointed it at it , and when i did it flash really bright three times and it disappeared, five days later i was working in the gated and my wife and friend where playing with are daughter on the trampoline , and she called over to look up at the sky , and coming from 3 directions where these 3 orbs coming together to form a triangle they stayed stationary fora bout 20 sec and they sepeated the same way they came in. my wife spotted them first and said she shined the laser pointer at the top sphere and she said she could she a shadow of a craft that you could see through it. i know sounds a little out there , but i just bought a canon t1 uv/ir camera i was wondering if i could get some tips on how to capture ufo thanx
content.summary: Ce-5 protocol bright orb showed up shinedd my laser at it, the it became a bright light and it fly off

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and i was going to go outside to check on my pet when suddenly something bright orange caught my eye there was something floating on top of the high school across the street south of my house it was floating towards my other direction and then also there was a slightly invisible little line behind it then when it started flying the line disappeared with a little red light the big orange orb continued towards me thats when i called my grandmother and warned my sisters my grandmother came out and also witnessed the orb and also my little sisters also saw from the window inside my house .When the orb got closer it was more like a glowing three foot rod with a light glowing belt ion the middle the light in the middle got greater to a point where it tripled in size then stopped in the middle and then the light started to shoot out a puff of blueish grey smoke around the craft which floated in the air and disappeared inside the smoke and left some smoke behind then left a bluish crystal like gas in the air also witnessed in front of us was our neighbors who also saw part of it to .
content.summary: Me and my sisters and grandmother also both my neighbors witnessed

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside with my husband we witnessed a bright beam of light  which turned to a glowing neon green light then the craft started to move first up then sideways then down where it proceeded to fade away in a light mist then disappeared . the light in sky continued to lightly glow with a green color.Lasting about 4minutes after craft was gone.
content.summary: Bright beam of light shown down then quick movement and green beam. then disappear in mist

content.detailedDescription: I was checking my grill smoker, when i noticed a light that seemed to be moving almost like a helicopter, but the lights were different. planes were in the area, near chicago-o'hare. i called my kids to come and take a look, and see if they also notice how this light moved. it was n/ne of my line of sight, at about 30-35 degrees high, between cassiopeia and the ground.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I watched this for over 30 min, flashed, hovered, erratic path

content.detailedDescription: My wife took two photos with her smartphone of the sky at sunset upon leaving a department store.  a couple of days later she noticed three orbs in the photos and sent them to me.  i am unable to find a good explanation since the photos were taken from two different camera angles and the three orbs seem to have descended.
content.summary: Three orbs observed in photos after taken

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
 - food4less parking lot in torrance, ca (cross-streets: sepulveda blvd/vermont ave)
 - walking through food4less parking lot with my friend chepo going back to his place.
2. what made you first notice the object?

 - kept seeing rows of 4 lights in single file on our walk to food4less and  i automatically assumed they were helicopters they were so close to the ground at first, then i thought about it again because the lights kept showing up and then it occurred to me that these 4 lights made no sound at all, and i don't know of any aircraft that doesn't make any noise. silent fireballs.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 - some type of aircraft

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
 - there were multiple rows of 4 lights that would fly in single file and then they split in all different directions once they elevated a little further up but were still visible with the naked eye. i looked everywhere to see where they were going and i seen the lights were being spit into the sky one by one, then they'd fly in 4's and then they'd split up and each one just disappeared. going up at a 90 degree angle. i'm sure many people saw these fireballs in the sky too, they were so close to the ground in the city! then when my friend chepo and i got back to his place, we could still see these lights except now they weren't in single file. it's as if they positioned each fireball in place to surround us. and when i mean "us," i mean surround a whole state or something. it looked like they just parked their fireballs in their assigned coordinates, then when everyone was present for the meeting, it was a circle that my friend and i live within. then they migrated further and further away in all different directions. there were so many of them, i'm sure many people seen all these fireball lights in the sky

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
 - it was awesome!!!!!!!!!!! i couldn't believe it because the year before i had caught another ufo in a picture  during the april blood moon!!!! this would be my 2nd time seeing ufo's if this picture is indeed what i believe it is...

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
 - it just shot straight up in a 90 degree angle into the nothingness of the skies' cosmic interdimensional cavities. 

(i took many pictures but i lost those, however i still have the video i recorded that night. it's 3 mins long and attached!)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A school of fireballs (ufos) danced "the cannonball-motion," then ascended 90 degrees to disappearance in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Since about the age of 10, i've been a ufo enthusiast. i've read books and, later years, followed sightings on the net. this time, it was my turn. it was just before 10 pm and my wife was in bed. our large bedroom window faces due north and this is what you see when in bed. i had just entered the room and she very calmly announced, "look, a ufo." i scrambled to the window and there it was: two very bright, slowly flashing white-blue lights that appeared to be on the rear of an air vehicle. it was moving slowly nnw and within 15 seconds it was over the ridgeline to the north. the direction of travel suggested that it had passed very close by our isolated home. for me, it was the typical response, "what did i just see?" this is a remote area 10 miles south of lander, wy. there is almost no one living near our home in the foothills and to the west is a major mountain range. the night was very dark - no moon. all i saw was these two bright, slowly pulsating lights as the craft moved out of sight, over the ridgeline. nothing more to add, i know what we saw. it definitely did not look like any aircraft that we are familiar with. just a short look, then it was gone. not too much later, at work, i ran into a neighbor and told her my tale. she replied with a story from her childhood, where she and friends saw silver, metallic craft in broad daylight in the same area. they got scared and ran home; nothing much more said about that sighting. they are out there and now after so many years, i saw one.
content.summary: Two bright, pulsating lights on air vehicle, traveling slowly to the nw, night sighting
